markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

##  Background

This is the workshop of [Sanza](/sanza/), cartographer focusing on understanding the [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/)'s geography.

## Points of interest

* This is a single-room building combining all the essential facilities for a workaholic cartographer.

## Characters

* [Sanza](/sanza/) and [Kaleb](/kaleb/)

## Gallery

<gallery widths="150px">
PE2 Sanzas Map Emporium Exterior.png | Building exterior
</gallery>
